1.0.name: wordpress/us-debt-clock
1.0.description: Add the US Debt Clock to your website and choose what information to display. Options include National Debt, Debt per Citizen/Taxpayer, Federal Spending, Medicare/Medicaid, Social Security, Defense, Federal Pensions, US Total Debt, Debt per Household, and Savings per Household. Information provided by USDebtClock.org. Go to Rebuild-US.net (http://rebuild-us.net/us-debt-clock/) to see a demo of the plugin.
